TopicTitle: Reverting a .mu file back to it's editable 3D model.

Articles.Content: How do you revert a .mu file back to an editable 3D model. I'm trying to edit B9 aerospace's cargo bays and tail sections to be able to hold and release pallets on a small tracked segment inside of the bay and tail, so I need to add some things to the .mu's 3D model.
